title: Gutter Roses
description: London, 1898Streetwalker Cath plies her trade behind respectable houses in Victorian London, alongside close friend and fellow streetwalker, Ben. When an ugly encounter puts them on the wrong side of the law, she and Ben must choose between risking their hearts— or their lives. A 3,700 word (approx 13 page) Victorian RomanceCW: violence; attempted rape
author: Jude Lucens
